1.content:
To start things off, you need to know a little bit about Gwyn. Here is a simple bio about her, and how you should format bios for new characters.

Name: Gwyn’dyla Starborn

Nick-name: Gwyn (Pronounced: Gwen)

Race: Half-Elf

Occupation: Adventurer/Wandering Swordswoman

Age: 22

Height: 5’6

Hair: Brightish dirty blond, often worn in a long singular braid.

Eye color: Shimmering emerald green.

Body type: A fit, slender build with a perky butt and a B-cup chest size.

Starting Equipment: A light-weight set of leather armor, consisting of:

A dark brown leather jerkin.
A pair of tight, leather pants (Which often show some prominent panty lines).
A pair of dark boots that reach up to her knees.
A pair of leather braizers.
A small satchel for important items.
And various pouches she wears on her belt for miscellaneous items.


Starting Weapons: Being a swordswoman, she travels very lightly on weaponry, which consists of:

A steel short sword, her main weapon of choice.
A small steel knife she hides in her boot.


Starting Panties: A pair of bright pink panties absolutely covered with small cutesy printings of little teddy bears all over. The frilly white waistband of her panties tends to ride up above her dark, leather pants, proudly showing off her undies to anybody passing by.

Bio: The Starborn family has been regarded as nobility of the highest esteem, and feared by many because of their natural magical abilities. Gwyn’s family line is an ancient bloodline that were the first to settle the colony of Gel’Quinas, which has now become one of the last elven cities since the great Cataclysm that destroyed the homeland of the elves. After hundreds of years of perfection of the Starborn line, Gwyn was the first error in their plan.

Gwyn was the first half-breed to sully the Starborn line after Gwyn’s mother, the High-Queen, got a little too frisky with one of the human nobles visiting the nation during an alcohol-filled banquet. At first Gwyn was tolerated by the family and nobility of the nation, but once they learned that she had been showing zero signs of magic ability, she was finally put into exile to hopefully hide the blemish on the family name.

Not that Gwyn was hurt in the slightest, quite the opposite really, she was desperate for freedom. Gwyn despised the oppressive aristocracy that came with her family. Every boring lesson on manners or politics was dreadful, and she detested the deceitful actions of suitors trying to woo her for a claim to power. She preferred her classes about swordsmanship or about the wild lands that have yet to be tamed. To be honest, she already was planning to escape the confines of Gel’Quinas before it was made official.

Free of her old home, she wanders the world, experiencing a freedom she has never felt before. She has a good sense of justice, but is still rather naïve, being recently free and still quite young. Despite this, she never backs down from a challenge, and will thrive in the wild world that she has been locked away from.

Intro


The thick, wooden gates of Gel’Quinas slam shut behind Gwyn with a loud crash. With a happy grin, Gwyn takes in a deep breath of air, the first free breath she’s taken in her life.

“Begone half-breed, you are no longer welcome here.” One of the two guards behind her gruffly orders, her voice slightly ringing behind the metal visor of her helmet. Gwyn turns around to look the woman in the eyes, but can’t see them through the small visor of the helmet.

“Later, assholes.” Gwyn eloquently replies while flipping the bird. The two gate guards grumble in annoyance, but make no move to retaliate. With a giggle, she turns back around to face the wide-open world at her fingertips. With nowhere to go but forward, she starts down the path. As she walks down the cobblestone road, she is already enthralled by the open lands around her, this being the first time outside the city walls. Already, her undies begin to peek out the back of her pants, greeting the new world with their cutesy teddy bear prints. However, as a few minutes pass, her panties have already ridden up a several inches above the waistband of her pants from all sides, earning a few giggles from those she passes by on the road.

Finally, she reaches a crossroad. She looks up at the sign of the place, weighing her options.
1: “Hmm, If I go north and keep going that way, I’ll be on my way to Barnacle-Water, the biggest pirate haven on the continent. Sounds fun.” Gwyn muses to herself as she turns up the road.

2: “Huh to the west is Xandara. I’ve heard of that place from gossip, they have this odd strict undies-only policy. Seems interesting enough.” Gwyn convinces herself as she walks toward the wedgie kingdom.

3: “If I go south, that takes me right to the Garden of Twilight. Gel’Quinas’ sworn enemy kingdom of dark elves. I’m sure a kingdom of exiles will take another one.” Gwyn nods her head as she makes her way to the land of edgy elves

4: “Well to the northwest, there is a small town called Corn. I wonder how they came up with that name.” Gwyn rolls her eyes as she walks the path the small farm town.

5: “Hmm, it’s getting late, it might be better to make camp for tonight. Maybe there will be a caravan to catch a ride with in the morning and just go where the wind blows.” Gwyn says to herself as she takes the bedroll out of her bag and lays it on the ground.

She laid her hand on Gywn’s burr cheeks and began rubbing them, causing the elf to shiver, before smacking the cheeks firmly, watching as it jiggles from the impact. Smirking she did it again and again, tanning Gywn’s bottom until it was as red as their gang colors.

They were in the midst of turning her atomic wedgie into a double when they were surprised by some guards! Though their own panties were already firmly wedged up, the brave (and horny) women threw themselves onto the pirates and began brawling viciously, tearing clothing and smacking flesh.

Gywn began crawling away rapidly, before standing up and sprinting to a stall and taking cover behind a shelf. She fixed her twice as large panties now and rubbed her sore bottom and began looking around.

Perception Fail!

Due to the intensity of the fighting, Gywn could not help but be distracted by all the things happening, noticing the atomic wedgies being prolifically thrown around and the jiggling, spanked bottoms. She felt a tap and turned around to see a fearful orc looking at her. Surprised and scared Gywn began backing up before the Orc waved her hands around rapidly.

Pausing, Gywn waited for her to respond. And realized that the skin tone and more human features told her that this Orc was in fact a Half-Orc.

“Elf. Need help. Loona help. Loona strong. But Loona hate wedgies! Elf help? Elf help, Orc help too.” Gywn mulled it over in her head before shaking the offered hand. For now though, they need to get out of the market place fast!

Her new ally, Loona, was rather short for an Orc and had an interesting brand in her forehead, but the time for observation was interrupted! The Palace Guards have arrived and began fighting indiscriminately against peasants and pirates, regaining lost ground. And something tells Gywn that they will wedgie her and Loona as well!

One day, while the chattel were being transported overseas, the ship had been attacked by pirates. Freed but on the run, she made her way offshore and into Barnacle Water by accident.

Already abused and humiliated, she was not in a good position. Time will tell if things get better.

Regardless, due to her life as a slave and also her heritage as a half Orc, she is very shy, meek, and submissive. Many wedgies will leave her frozen in pain and shock but as the wedgies continued to mount she began getting used to them.

115.content:
"Are there any more gangs I need to know of Alith?" says Gywn, offering her butt to the rowdy pirate, already shaking with anticipation for some reason.

“Why am I getting excited?” Thought Gywn before she felt Alith grab her waistband and pull! This time, the panties made their way past her head, snapping down on her forehead. Alith laughed heartily and gave her backside a few playful slaps.

”Ah, yer an eager lass!” she chortled. “There’s a gang just for wedgie loves like you.”

”R-Really?!” asked Gwyn eagerly, before blushing, clearing her throat, and saying “Really?” in a less enthusiastic tone.

Alith found that endearing for some reasonand laughed heartily before replying, “The Flossbutts have a wee presence in the docks, but are much stronger across the bay. They be like masochistic nerds, causin’ ruckus, gettin’ caught, havin’ their panties pulled and rumps reddened, then makin’ a break for it ta do it again. Sound like yer type’a thing, girlie?”

As much as the disgraced halfling didn’t want to admit it, it did sound like fun; it reminded her of something her half-sister Aerith would do, in which she’d do naughty things just to get punished, then do it again. Aerith would always tell Gywn it was to feel alive, that she felt truly herself. The dorky Aerith who was constantly humiliated and not Princess Aerith, the wet blanket at parties.

”Wouldn't that be disturbing the peace?” Wondered Gywn aloud, then realized she said and repeated it as a question to Alith. Again Alith laughed and Gywn pouted.

Wiping her eyes Alith said, “My dear. Disturbing the peace? Yer hilarious lass! The Wu-Qen as I said love this sort of thing! They eat this kind of stuff up! I hear they even have some guardswomen dress up as the Flossbutts just to join them in the fun!”

“Oh, really?” asked Gwyn, thinking it over. “So, where at the docks are they?”

”By the ship with the wedgied lass on her bow,” said Alith, stepping aside. “Tell ‘em Alith sent’cha, and they’ll bring you right on board!”

”Okay, th-thank you for the tip!” said Gwyn, not bothering to remove her atomic wedgie as she made her way to the docks. “I hope we meet again, Alith!”

She heard jeers and laughs and even cat whistles as Gywn past some sailors hauling their load off their ships. Blushing but heavily enjoying the attention she was receiving Gywn began moving her hips into wide motions. Eventually she came across a massive wooden sailing ship that, sure enough, carried a sculpture of a wedgied mermaid on the front, her panties pouring out of the back of the fish half and being firmly secured to her forehead. Outside the ship, she found a few women wearing sailor’s outfits, the skirts showing off the bottom half of their... well, bottoms, and their dorky panties. One sailor, who sported thick-rimmed glasses and rainbow-striped panties, turned to see Gwyn approach.

”State your business,” she declared, removing a paddle from her belt.

”Uh, I-i wanted to join you girls,” said Gwyn. “A-Alith sent me here.”

”Alith you say? Well why didn’t yer say so? Come on girls let’s give her a Flossbutt welcome!”

The other sailors there quickly darted forward and removed her panties from her head, before quickly reattaching them to a hook on one of the ship’s cargo arms. The elf was hoisted up into the air, blushing a bright red as she was lowered onto the deck of the vessel. Gywn moaned hesitantly, still rather embarrassed that she was enjoying this so much and gasped as someone spanked her butt! Suddenly Flossbutt members surrounded her, some holding her steady while others grabbed at her red bubble butt, spanking with their bare hands or paddles. Despite the abuse her butt was surely going through Gywn felt alive, invigorated as she felt the burn of the spanking and began moaning freely.

”This butt here looks like it’s taken a fair bit. And you ain’t crying in the slightest?” One member asked, marveling at how red Gywn’s butt was and even pressing her face on it to check the what before darting her head back.

”N-naaah~ No, it actually feels kinda good,” moaned Gwyn, hoping she wouldn’t be ridiculed as she cupped her crotch.

”You’re just what we need!” The member cheered. “The Wu-Qen always spank their captives as punishment, but ladies like you can take twice that.”

Gwyn felt relieved that she was among people with similar interests, but was still slightly embarrassed that her enjoyment for wedgies and spankings was an asset to this group. It was then the glasses girl came up, giving her own squeezes to the new recruit’s hindquarters.

”I’m Desola Upskirt,” she said, adjusting her glasses. “I’m leader of the Flossbutts, the winner of the Grayman’s Fury playing contest five times in a row, and the biggest dork between Barnacle-Water and Fishall. What’s your name, spank-magnet?”

”I’m Gwyn. You know, for the ‘biggest dork’, you look kinda hot.”

”Don’t judge a book by it’s cover, Gwyn. I thought ‘Poeshyn Pirate Paddling’ would be a great book, but it’s just pretentious and full of more holes than a thong at the hands of Alith.”

Gywn giggled at the description before clearing her throat and holding out her hand. Des nodded and shook it roughly before saying, “Welcome aboard pilgrim, let’s get down to business.”

”We’re a family on the good ship Ripper,” said Des, removing Gwyn’s panties from the hook. “If we’re to work together, we need to know each other. I want you to introduce yourself to at least five people here, alright, Gwyn?”

The elf saw two women who had received bra connection wedgies, one with bright green granny panties with frog prints, the other wearing plain white frilly panties. Both were playing a game of some sort on a board, with game pieces in both sides a strategy game it seems. Gywn decided to introduce herself,

“Um hello there, my name is Gywn.” She said, holding out her hand. The one on the left with the green granny panties had blonde hair and blue eyes. She regarded the hand for a second before grasping it and cheerfully saying, “Hello! My name is Jessica! My friend Asha here was teaching me how to play...what is this game called again?”

Asha was a short girl eith black hair cropped short, she had frilly blue panties with mermaids on them likewise shoved up her butt and connected to her bra like Jessica. She shrugged and moved a piece, causing Jessica to stare confused before gasping. “Awwww man! I lost again?”

Jessica pouted before turning around and offering her booty to Asha. Asha grinned and unclipped her bra, causing the wedgie to snap back before regrouping the granny panties and with a strong pull, yanked them up to her shoulders in one yank! Moaning Jessica gripped her chair tightly as Asha steadily stretched her panties up higher and higher, aiming high for an atomic wedgie! As Jessica has her underpants pulled down over her eyes, Asha playfully smacked her opponent’s bum.

”Wedgies are a great way to spice up these dusty old games,” she said, before turning to Gwyn with a smile. “Jessica thinks she’s going to beat me at this game. I told her that when she beats me, I’ll be her wedgie slave.”

”And I will win!” remarked Jessica, sitting back down. “I’ve dreamed of it for weeks, and I won’t stop until it happens.”

Gwyn smiled at these antics, turning to showcase her red booty and bunched-up panties to her new friends. “I’d join your game, girls, but I think I’ll wait until my butt’s stopped burning.”

The newcomer lifted up the pirate’s skirt, showcasing her very pale behind.

”The name’s Gwyn,” she said. “What’s your name, froggy?”

”My shipmates all call me Shinybutt, since my backside is fairly pale,” responded the frog pantied pirate. “I get ‘captured’ the least of us, so they put me here so I know what it’s like.”

She gestured to another pirate walking towards them, carrying a paddle. “She’s supposed to be the one spanking me, sooooo wish me luuuuck!”

Feeling a little bold being amongst fellow like minded I people, Gywn Asked,

“I-is it p-possible to join you?” Stuttering only a little Gywn appluaded herself even if she felt extremely embarrassed.

The one wielding the paddle smirked, grabbing Gwyn’s shoulder and bending her over. “Of course you can,” she said. “I’ll deal with you first, then I can copy the redness of your bottom to Shinybutt here.”

Without further encouragement needed the woman vended Gywn over her knee and pulled her pants down. With an almost indifferent yank of her hand she wrenched Gywn’s frilly panties up and over her head and shoved the waistband into her mouth, forcing Gywn to chew on it. Gagging Gywn complied and gasped as she felt the paddle hit her booty. Her derrière was made an even deeper red, and the combination of pain and pleasure made Gwyn start tearing up before the paddling stopped.

”There you go!” The woman said, squeezing at Gwyn’s backside. “Old Paddy sure sorted you out! And now to Shinybutt.”

Gywn felt herself get gently moved off her lap and sat her on her burning backside on the deck. Gywn tried to move the panties off her face to at least her forehead to see the ensuring spanking but the tears were like adhesive, glueing her panties to her face. Groaning at being unable to see what was going on, Gywn simply say there content in grinding in her atomic and listening to Shinybutt’s moans as she get what sounded like a spanking of the lifetime!

Gwyn felt her pantymask get removed by someone else, a young woman smiling down at her. Her skirt was ripped away, showing her pink granny panties with crown prints, and she seemed to have an air of royalty.

”Frolin, third daughter of Queen Elizabeth VI, at your service,” she greeted.

”Gwyn. Wait, are you royalty too?”

”Quite so. However, as the third daughter, I have nary a chance to take a throne for myself. Desiring adventure, I made for the sea, the Flossbutts finding me and capturing me, intending to use me for ransom.” Frolic then chortled, shaking her hips. “But I liked their style, so ‘persuaded’ them to keep me as a member.”

The half-elf smirked, she liked this lady’s style. The noblewoman continued,

“It’s funny, the Wu-Qen are all about propriety and formal customs. Tell them I’m a part of the royal family and you’d get access to a lot of places easily! That is until they find out I technically wasn’t a part of the family anymore.”

She began giggling again as she continued her story, “They tolerated me for a while. It was rather fun actually! I was given the freedom to give wedgies and wedgies to their Royal Guard, who don’t like it by the way so it was more fun hehe, I was able to give wedgies to their governess, and I was even given a gift, a small loan of a few dozen gold coins as a sign of Wu-Qen hospitality.”

1152.title: Meet n’ Greet

11521.content:
Co-written with TomtomtheMultitasker

The half-elf stepped down below deck, finding the captain’s quarters at the rear of the ship. There, she found Des in her rainbow panties and a matching bra. She turned back and adjusted her glasses upon seeing Gwyn there.

”I’m glad you’re here, Gwyn,” she said. “I have two important tasks for you.”

”Yes, ma’am! What’s the first one?”

”First, I want you to spank me.” Gwyn blinked. “I have two different types of pirates, those who strike, and those who stay behind to be stricken. I want to see which one you are.”

Gwyn had to blush, but gave it some thought. Then she had a brilliant idea. “How about I spank you first and you spank me afterwards?”

Des stood there vaguely impressed before bending over her captain’s desk. “Well?”

Gywn didnt need any more encouragement. She gingerly gripped the nerdy captain’s panties and gave a soft tug, gently stretching it and seeing how far it will go. Once they reached her mid-back she let go, grabbing a nearby paddle hanging from the doorknob. Without any warning, she swung, and it slapped Des’ booty with a loud clap! Des gasped, her eyes shutting in euphoria as the spanking continued. Gwyn didn’t have much experience on the giving end of a spanking, but she certainly wasn’t sloppy about it either. Within ten minutes, the pirate leader had an ass as red as her newest recruit’s. She stood up slowly, rubbing over her stinging behind and taking the paddle from Gwyn moaning lowly.

”Your booty’s plenty paddled already, so I’ll try and go easy on you,” said Des cheekily.

Gwyn couldn’t help but squeal from the first of these “easy” spanks, her rosy red rump jiggling from each smack of the paddle. They both different definitions of easy since Des slowly and methodically sent a hard smack of the paddle onto her jiggling behind. Her red rear was just starting to fade but now returned in force, the color of cherries almost. Tears were springing from Gywn’s eyes but she couldn’t deny the pleasure she was getting from this. She didn’t know how long she had been paddled for, but felt it wasn’t long enough once it was done.

”That felt pretty good,” she sighed, not leaning back up. “So, my... my next assignment?”

”We’re going to intercept a Wu-Qen ship bringing in gold this evening,” she said. “Wanna help us raid it?”

The half-elf thought it through, deciding that such swashbuckling adventure would befit her new life as a pirate. And if they lost? Well not much of a big deal to her. “Alright let’s do it!” she exclaimed excitedly, causing Des to chuckle at her enthusiasm.

“Alright we strike tomorrow, best get a good night’s rest Gywn but don’t forget to acquaint yourself with the rest of the crew. You’ll be with Frolin’s crew.”

Gwyn nodded and left, opening the doors to the rest of the deck. She swiftly found Frolin by the bow smacking the rump of another half-elf, this one sporting purple hair and a green bra and granny panties. The princess turned and waved to Gwyn.

”Hey, Des tells me I’ll be working with you tomorrow,” she said.

”It’ll be a pleasure having your company, Gwyn! This here is Croc, named as such for the crocodile tears she used to spill during her spankings.”

”I-I never cried!” the half-elf, Croc, tried protesting. “Maybe I teared up a little, but no crying!”

The next few smacks sent her way caused the half elf to squeak and indeed her tears did come but she held in her cries. Huffing Frolin let her up, the half elf quickly escaping down below the decks rubbing her rear.

“Huh guess she got tougher, how about you Gywn? Care for a spanking?” Gywn shyly shook her head,

“Not this time Frolin, I think i had enough for today.” Gywn turned around and showcased her still red rear. Nodding Frolin snorted before slapping her rump, causing the half elf to yelp in surprise.

Gwyn found an open room, setting her bag down and stripping to her undies for bed. She gave a little shriek as she was hoisted into the air by her undies, finding that an Orc was holding her waistband.

”The name’s Groll,” she greeted. “This is usually where I sleep.” She then laughed and hung Gwyn’s panties from a coat hook. “But it’s okay if you sleep there for tonight.”

Groll then stripped down to her undergarments, a plain black bra and granny panties, then climbed into bed. Gywn simply swayed around a little, surprised to find herself feeling drowsy despite her wedgie.

11521.title: First Assignment

115211.content:
Written by Tomtomthemuiltitasker

The next day saw Gwyn’s sore booty healed up, and she and the other members of the raiding party were given special good luck wedgies as the ship left the dock. The half-elf’s new white and pink granny panties with a teddy bear on the butt were secured over her forehead in minutes, Des giving her a few friendly slaps on the rear to go with the outfit, just as they spotted the supply ship in the distance, waving the flag of the Wu-Qen proudly.

”This is it, ladies,” said Frolin as she fixed her own panties, a pair of emerald green with dragons on them, likely stolen from Wu-Qen. “We’ll be facing some pretty strong opposition, so be prepared to subdue some guards for the glory of our plunder and booty!”

”Or lose and get a public spanking in town again,” suggested Croc jokingly, earning her a smack on the bottom by Groll.

”That’s defeatist talk Croc! Have some confidence or you will be spanked again.” Groll retorted as she hefted up a large club.

“I don’t know, both sound good to me,” said Gwyn, she and the group getting ready to jump from one ship to another. As the supply ship passed by, the four jumped onboard, instantly meeting opposition.

Multiple levies dressed in basic armor were on the supply ship, and they drew their cudgels to ward off the invaders. Groll took her club and started swinging it at their opponents; she hit knees, arms, butts, whatever it took to bring down the soldiers of the Wu-Qen. Croc took a simpler approach, lifting their skirts and stretching their granny panties into the sky.

Gwyn tried out her fellow halfling’s strategy, walking up behind a levy, pulling back her skirt, then tugging up hard on her blue granny panties with white stripes. The levy blushed and squealed, but didn’t try fighting back. However, Gwyn was too busy with that one to notice another sneaking up behind her until her teddy grannies were launched up her booty!

”You’ve made a mistake boarding this boat!” she announced, trying to be grand but looking more cute. “Once we’ve rounded up all you pirates, we’ll be sure to teach you a lesson, right in the center of town!”

Frolin noticed this as she gave two of the levies red butts to match their boyshorts. She ripped away the one’s skirt, showcasing her white granny panties with pink polka dots, then started to bounce her around like a giant yo-yo.

”You owe me for this,” said the royal playfully. “I think a nice spanking wedgie to some music should do it.”

Gwyn agreed, letting her wedgie stick out like a white teddy bear printed cape as she picked up one of the fallen cudgels. This would make it more fun to deal with fallen foes. As she eyed the one she dealt with trying to get back up, she took the cudgel and slapped it against her rump. The Wu-Qen levy squealed and dropped back down, the half-elf laughing as she began to do it regularly, almost making a rhythm out of it. Finally, the last of the levies had been brought to her knees, the group giving each other their congratulations.

”This is only half the mission, ladies,” said Frolin, gesturing to the doors leading down to the cargo hold. “Once we’re down there, we could face any number of foes, so be prepared.”

12.content:
Deciding to find out if the rumors she'd heard were true, Gwyn began making her way in the direction of Xandara. The rumors could definitely have just been made up, as most rumors are, but if they weren't, well what's more free than walking around in nothing but your underwear, especially coming from a kingdom filled with stuffy formalities and politics? With that, she was on her way, a smile on her way as she moved away from her old life.

As she moved along the pathway to the strange city, she began to notice something. There were quite a few scattered colors around as she got closer to Xandara, colors that didn't belong in nature, and as she got even closer, she noticed that they were clothes. Dresses, tunics, pants, even cheap-looking armor pieces were thrown all around, hanging from trees, covering shrubbery, or simply lying on the ground. As she reached the city, she found out exactly why.

Approaching the large gate that led to Xandara, Gwyn was met by a pair of guards, both of which seemed to be wearing chain mail bikinis. As she got closer, though, Gwyn would find out that they were simply in their undergarments, both of which were colored steel gray to give the illusion of armor, however skimpy that armor may be.

"Hold!" One of the guards commanded, Gwyn stopping a few feet in front of them. "Seems as though you're new to the city. Strip down to your skivvies!" She then commanded, giving Gwyn a bit of a shock. "It helps us dole out punishment more easily" She then explained, that indeed making some sense to Gwyn. "If you are within city limits with anything more on, then you will be punished harshly."

She was more than up for this before now, but now that she knew the rumor was true, did she really want to go through with what they were commanding? Well, if all of the citizens were required to anyways, then why not? Right?

Option 1: "Right!" Gwyn proceeds to strip and enter the city where she's met with others nude down to their undies

Option 2: "Wrong!" Gwyn refuses the guards and is immediately brought into the city for punishment

13421.title: A little exploring doesn’t hurt right?

14.content:
"Well, it doesn't sound all that exciting, but I'm sure there's adventuring work that needs doing." Gwyn muses to herself as she wanders towards the northwest road. The sun is beginning to hang low in the sky as she continues her journey, the number of travelling people slowly lowering in number as she passes by wheat field after wheat field.

Wait a second, that's a lot of wheat.

"Isn't this place called Corn? There isn't a single corn stalk for miles!" Gwyn complains about the irony, but continues on anyway.

As the sun begins to set, the town of Corn is just up ahead, and not a moment too soon, as Gwyn's feet have begun to ache from the long day of uneventful walking. Just at the town's borders, the fading light of the sunset reflects off of something shiny on the ground. Fortunately, Gwyn's eyesight is inherited from her elf side of the family, and she easily locks onto the object.

Its a Gold Coin!

One gold coin is worth 10 silver coins, which in turn are worth 10 copper. While it seems like quite a bit, it would be enough for food and board for a night. So its still a lucky find!

With a gleeful smile, Gwyn skips up to the coin on the floor, eager to fetch her first coin of hopefully many. Just as she bent over to pick it up.

RRRRIIIIIIPPPPPPPP

Her tight, leather pants split right up the middle, from her groin to the bottom of her waistband, and utterly exposing the bright pink, teddy bear covered undies that she worked, and failed, to hide under her pants.

Critical Fail!

Gwyn's face turns to a brilliant shade of red as her hands clamp back on her butt, feeling both the utterly ruined pants, and the soft pink undies. She quickly puts the coin in her bag, and keeps both of her hands behind her, one hand on each cheek as she carefully waddles into town, praying that nobody is behind her.

She does her best to keep her back to the walls of the buildings as she navigates through town toward the inn, but then her elven eyes spy something that could help her!

A clothes line gently sways in the breeze, bearing a downright odd assortment of clothes hanging from the ropes. Perhaps Gwyn could "Borrow" some clothes from the line, and hopefully make it to the tavern before it gets too late.

1: "I'm sure they won't mind if I just take this. Its small and hardly noticeable" Gwyn quietly convinces herself as she approaches the line and grabs an incredibly short, frilly, pink skirt from the line.

2: "Of course not! Stealing is wrong! I'd rather have everyone see my undies before I'd take somebody's personal belongings!" Gwyn snaps to herself, letting go of her pants and marching straight to the inn.

3: "I-is that a maid outfit? W-Well I've honestly always wanted to try one of those on." Gwyn bashfully admits to herself, her blush rekindling as she pulls off the complete outfit.

4: "Oh! How convenient! Another pair of leather pants! Hopefully they're my size" Gwyn says as she pulls of a pair of leather pants that is two sizes too small.

5: "I think there are some more outfits on there, I just need a better look." Gwyn says as she gets closer to the clothes line.

141.content:
"I'm sure they won't mind if I just take this. Its small and hardly noticeable" Gwyn quietly convinces herself as she approaches the line and grabs an incredibly short, frilly, pink skirt from the line.

Gingerly Gwyn strips off her ruined leather pants, and slips on her new pink skirt, a small blush dusting her cheeks as she gently pulls down at the frilly bottom of it. It’s much too small, for it can’t even cover the bottom of her rump. The bright pink fabric of her skirt contrasts rather brightly with her more mature jerkin and leather boots.

Despite how ridiculous she looks, Gwyn steels her resolve and makes her way directly towards the inn.

The rowdy talk and laughter of the busy inn can be heard from several blocks down the road, making it clear which building Gwyn needed to go to.

Gwyn stops infront of the door, and looks up to the sign, “The Tipsy Kitten”

With a deep breath, she puts both hands on the door and pushes it open. The noisy din of the building was only muffled by the door, and now is at full blast on Gwyn’s senestive ears.

Despite the audiable anarchy of the tavern, Gwyn walks inside, completely unnoticed by the diverse crowd. With eyes of wonder. Gwyn scans the large room of laughter and fun.

A large, blonde haired barbarian woman laughs with glee as she gives a painful looking noogie to a smaller dwarf woman who’s bright yellow panties covered with little white polka dots are glued over her face.

In another corner of the room, a game of strip poker between a dark elf, an orc, and a Fox-girl beastkin. Each one striped completely down to their panties, being a glittering pink thong, a pair of white panties with frilly pink trimming and with “Princess” printed boldly on the butt, and a pale orange pair of panties with little fox faces all over, in that respective order. The faces of each girl is a deep shade of crimson, each one supremely humiliated to be stripped down so far, but too prideful to back down of the game.

As Gwyn takes a seat at an empty table, she notices a certain energenic cat-girl skirting through the craziness of the inn. Her hair is a bright orange, which matches the color of the fur of her cute little cat ears and fluffy tail. The cat-girl would look like an average human if not for those two unique features. She is currently wearing a baby blue frilly dress that very much resembles a lewd maid outfit.

“Hello darrrrrling.” The cat-girl purrs whenever she pronounces an r, “What can I get you?” She asks as she pulls out a little pen and paper, clearly the barmaid of the place, hence the name of the tavern.

Gwyn places her gold coin on the table. “Just the meal of the night, and a room to go with it.”

The car girl eyes the coin and grins. “You’rrrrrre in luck, thererrre’a one room left, but you gotta sharrrrre it with me!” She giggles as she lifts up her skirt, exposing an adorable pair of baby blue panties covered with little white paw prints all over. She pulls the front of the waistband forward and fishes down her undies, and hands Gwyn a warm key.

“Be warrrrned cutie, I like to snuggle.” She says with a wink as she whisks the coin away with a swipe of her hand. “It’s the last door on the top floor, on your left when you get tired.” She says over her shoulder as she skirts back into the rest of the room to get the food.

Within a few minutes, a large bowl of soup is placed in front of Gwyn, who hungrily begins to eat it quick. And now with a full belly, she decides what to do next.

Option 1: She decides to go right to the job bulletin board for a quest, She is an adventurer after all.

Option 2: The tavern seems fun! Maybe there are some games to be played or pranks to be pulled!

Option 3: Well it is rather late, maybe heading in for a quick nap wouldn’t hurt.

“Well I am an adventurer now I suppose, and that was my only gold coin, so I guess I better find a quest.” Gywn thought to herself before getting up and nearly tripping over an intoxicated human.

Avoiding the grasping limbs Gywn made her way almost coyly to the bulletin board, where she joined two other adventurers, a newbie human like her and a veteran orc. Both women were busy studying the available quests and seem to be party members. Amusingly the Orc was busy hiking her companion’s panties up so the human can see higher, cupping her crouch in pain and embarrassment as her flower print granny panties were shown on display. “Alexia” her waistband read if Gywn’s sight was to be believed.

Shaking her head in amusement, Gywn looked at the board herself, checking her options.

#1: “Goblins! These damn rascals have been a ruckus to all inhabitants of Corn! These sly tricksters have been harassing villagers and caravans for weeks! And are thought to be based in a small cave nearby. Beware! These greenskin girls may be small and relatively dumb! But they can be cunning and mischievous! Stay on the lookout for any traps and have a good sword arm because goblins will surely try to overwhelm you!” Recommended party size of 2-4

Reward: 20 silver or 2 gold coins

#2: “Bandits! It’s bad enough that we have to deal with the Dark Elve’s annual harvesting season of both crops and young women, but now we have bandits harasssing us too! These cutthroat outlaws have been kidnapping and ransoming our people, enslaving those who cannot pay! This is a serious problem! We can I’ll afford to lose anymore people from our towns and villages!

Reward: 5 gold, 1 additional gold coin per bandit captured, 5 if it is the leader. Recommend a full party size of 3-4

Hmmmmm. So Gywn can possibly attempt any of these quests but they would be rather difficult alone.

The sounds of stretching fabric reached ear as the human screeched before giggling along with her friend as the Orc delivered a rather strong yank to her panties, the abused underwear already reaching the back of the blushing human’s head.

Well they might be some help to Gywn, especially the Orc admittedly.

Then again Gywn can attempt to find other quests. Looking back to the board...

14111.content:
Written by LordwithEyes

Goblins didn’t seem too difficult for Gywn, even alone, and she reached out to grab it before another hand gripped it first.

The first thing that Gywn saw was a fully enclosed helmet staring back at her, one that had certainly seen better days.

The second thing she noticed was her form fitting leather armor with metal plating around the chest, elbows, and knees. The leather hugged her figure generously and Gywn could make out a faint pantyline through the tight leather. She was knocked out of her musing however when the armored figure just up and left, without even saying anything!

“Hey hold on a minute! I was about to do that! Aren’t you even going to ask?” Gywn exclaimed incredulously at the stranger,

“No.” Was her flat response, and she began walking away. Angry that she was being blown off in such a way, Gywn marched over and was going to give her a stern nagging when a pair of mischievous halfings ran past and pantsed the half elf, causing the disgraced lordling to trip and have her arms reach out for the closest thing to grab. The stranger’s tight pants.

The tight pants seem to have no problem sliding down and the stranger’s pale bare legs and luscious bubble butt seemed to shine the tavern as they were exposed along with her blue and white granny panties with clouds floating on them, complete with a smiley face sun blaring on the butt. Laughter immediately filled the tavern as everyone got an eye full of Gywn’s frilly teddy bear panties and the stranger’s childish panties. Gywn’s face flushed deep red but the stranger seemed to sigh and walk over to the receptionist’s desk, who for her part had a light blush and eyes that said she fancied the stranger.

They were too far away to make out but Gywn was busy pulling her frilly skirt up to notice. Once she fixed her dignity and patched it up as best as she could, she turned to see the stranger marching out, having pulled her pants back up and now sporting a small shield, a buckler she recalls, and Gywn rushes out to meet her before she could leave.

She was stopped by a few patrons, particularly a dwarf being thrown around by a blond barbarian, but Gywn dodged the squat projectile and marched outside. The stranger passed by a stall and picked a potion from it up and deposited the coins in the same instance, walking off again as quickly as she came. The merchant woman for her part barely batted an eye, more focused on her book then a pesky regular.

Gywn passed by with barely a glance as well. She finally caught up to the stranger when they got to the gate and she shouted for her attention.

“Hey there stranger! Sorry about the tavern but I was wondering if you’d like my help! The quest recommends at least two people!”

The stranger stood still and seemed to consider it, she likewise turned around to glance at Gywn, giving her a stern shakedown.

She nodded her head and said, “Very well.” And walked towards the quest’s general location. Blinking Gywn hurried after her.

While on the road, Gywn noticed two things. One, there were debri and trash everywhere, be they discarded equipment or ripped underwear, and two, her companion was hardly a social person. Like at all.

Her words can be summed up as “Is that so?” “Yes” “No” and “Maybe” and Gywn found that if she wanted anything that resembled a conversation, she would have to be very specific. She found it her nickname was Orcbolg (Or Goblin Punisher) but not much else. That she had been an adventurer for only a week but had gained valuable experience and a journal she keeps cataloging her experiences.

She had some nice art skills as Gywn studied the rump of a slavegirl taken by the goblins, and admittedly the goblins themselves. They were quite cute in a monstergirl sort of way.

They reached the village and talked with its Village elder, who pointed upstream to a cave opening, seemingly resembling that of a monster’s ravenous mouth. When they got to the entrance they saw nothing but darkness down there. Regardless Orcbolg as she’s called had no fear and lit a torch, walking down. Before they went though, the Elder notified them of another group that had ventured before them but failed to return...a week ago. Orcbolg nodded and carried on.

“Goblins are dull, but they’re not stupid. Just idiotic. There’s a difference. They are clever and cruel and love humiliating everyone around them. Nobody knows where they come from, other then that it was the result of some magic spores. The world is filled with these disgusting pervert, and I will punish them all for their transgression!” This was the most emotion Gywn heard from this Orcbolg, and was curious to see what they did to earn her ire.

As they walked deeper, they got to the first totem. It was a crude staff made of wood and had hooks on it with torn fabric, along with a crude drawing of a goblin face leering above a butt. The sign was illegible but the warning was clear.

Orcbolg tore it down and gripped the staff in her hand. She twirled it a little and nodded to herself, before snapping it over her knee. She turned to a bemused Gywn and said,

“These totems are early warning signs. They mark the edge of a goblin territory. Seeing how they’re still in the cave, I reckon the goblins aren’t a large clan here right now to expand outward. Watch out for ambushes, they can come at any time.”

She waved her torch at a wall, revealing another entrance, causing Gywn to gasp. It was very well camouflaged in the dark and with her eyes glued to the peculiar totem in front of her, there would've been no doubt that Gywn would've missed it.

"How about we ambush Goblins for a change?" She walked forward, gesturing at Gywn to follow. She obliged and the two steadily creeped inwards deeper. Ripped panties and...discharge showed where struggles were and Gywn blushed at some of the aftermath results. Orcbolg however stoically carried on before holding up her hand.

"What can you do? Your abilities?" Gywn boasted her proficiency in swordsmanship. Sneaking...not so much.

"If we continue, there would be no doubt that the Goblins will see the light and stage an ambush. Either we douse the torch, and go in blind in hopes of remaining undetected, or we prepare to fight prematurely."

Gywn began to nervously ponder their situation
